[ library(ic) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

neg(+Con)

Constraints Con is negated.
Con
Constraint

Description

Equivalent to 0 $= (Con)

The reified constraint Con is negated. Con must be a constraint that has a corresponding reified form.

See Also

and / 2, and / 3, neg / 2, or / 2, or / 3, => / 2, => / 3, =:= / 3, =< / 3, =\= / 3, >= / 3, > / 3, < / 3
